scene_description: In a bright and cheerful bedroom, the morning sun streams through a window with yellow curtains, casting a warm glow over the colorful walls decorated with drawings and stickers. A soft carpet covers the floor, and a small wooden dresser sits against the wall. The room is filled with the sounds of birds chirping outside and the faint hum of a running clock. A backpack rests by the door, ready for the school day, while the child is in the middle of choosing clothes to wear, creating a lively, busy, and playful atmosphere.

items.description: A young child standing in the middle of the room, wearing pajamas, holding a blue shirt in one hand and a pair of socks in the other. Their hair is slightly messy from sleep, and they are looking at their dresser, deciding what to wear. The child has a curious and excited expression on their face, and their feet are bare on the soft carpet.
A small wooden dresser with three drawers, slightly open. Clothes peek out from the drawers at odd angles. A small lamp with a yellow shade sits on top, and a few colorful socks are scattered nearby.
A window with yellow curtains tied to the side. Sunlight filters through, casting playful shadows on the floor and walls. Outside, green leaves of a tree gently sway in the breeze.
A small red backpack resting near the door, upright and zipped closed, ready to be filled for school.

questions.question: Which word in this sentence is a noun? 'The child holds a blue shirt.'
Which word in this sentence is a verb? 'The child is choosing socks.'
Which word in this sentence is an adjective? 'The lamp has a yellow shade.'
Which word in this sentence is a pronoun? 'They are looking at the dresser.'
Which word in this sentence is an article? 'A backpack rests by the door.'

scene_type: medium shot (subject from waist up plus immediate details)
